dt: {bc}to predict by projecting past experience or known data

dt.t: {wi}extrapolate{/wi} public sentiment on one issue from known public reaction on others

dt: {bc}to project, extend, or expand (known data or experience) into an area not known or experienced so as to arrive at a usually conjectural knowledge of the unknown area

dt.t: {wi}extrapolates{/wi} present trends to construct an image of the future

dt: {bc}to infer (values of a variable in an unobserved interval) from values within an already observed interval
{bc}to perform the act or process of {a_link|extrapolating}

shortdef: to predict by projecting past experience or known data
to project, extend, or expand (known data or experience) into an area not known or experienced so as to arrive at a usually conjectural knowledge of the unknown area
to infer (values of a variable in an unobserved interval) from values within an already observed interval
